examples: She grabbed his arm as he got up to leave.
Ella lo agarró del brazo mientras se levantaba para irse.
She grabbed the child's hand and ran.
Agarró la mano del niño y corrió.
He grabbed hold of me and wouldn't let go.
Me agarró y no me soltó.
He grabbed her around the throat and squeezed.
La agarró por el cuello y apretó.
